categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in 128 BBY.

The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook states that Eppie Belden is 132 years old at the time of the Bakura Incident, which takes place in 4 ABY. Although this year is not stated outright in the source material, simple mathematics arrives at a birth date of 128 BBY.
